name: Llandudno Christmas Parade

location.address: From Llandudno Railway Station through Mostyn Street, Llandudno LL30 2RP

description: The Llandudno Christmas Parade is North Wales' most spectacular festive procession, transforming the Victorian seaside resort into a magical wonderland as dusk falls. Starting from Llandudno Railway Station at 4pm, the parade winds through the town's elegant streetsâ€”along Vaughan Street, into the main shopping thoroughfare of Mostyn Street, past the Town Hall on Lloyd Street, down Madoc Street, and back to the station. Illuminated floats, marching bands, costumed characters, and of course Father Christmas himself create an enchanting spectacle that draws thousands of families to the streets. The parade marks the official start of the Christmas season in Llandudno, with the town's beautiful Victorian buildings and twinkling lights providing a picture-perfect backdrop.
